sentences.sContent: The amniotic fluid cushioning the baby in your uterus has reached its highest level this week.
sentences.sContent_eng: The amniotic fluid cushioning the baby in your uterus has reached its highest level this week.
sentences.sCn: 这周，子宫里起缓冲作用的羊水达到了它最高的水平。

sentences.sContent: Perhaps we are really talking about amniotic fluid, which surrounds the foetus in the birth sac.
sentences.sContent_eng: Perhaps we are really talking about amniotic fluid, which surrounds the foetus in the birth sac.
sentences.sCn: 也许我们真正在谈论的是羊水，也就是包围着胎儿的那些液体。

sentences.sContent: Your baby is practicing swallowing amniotic fluid this week working out her digestive system and absorbing water into her body.
sentences.sContent_eng: Your baby is practicing swallowing amniotic fluid this week working out her digestive system and absorbing water into her body.
sentences.sCn: 婴儿这击会开始练习吞咽羊水，锻炼她的消化系统，吸收水到她体内。

words.tran: [脊椎] 羊膜动物；脊椎动物

trans.tranOther: of or relating to the amnion
